name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ruth Geneva ROBINSON, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ruth Geneva ROBINSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: William T. Shulick, Blairsville, for appellant.
Walter S. Vuckovich, Dist. Atty., Indiana, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
368 A.2d 270
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ruth Geneva ROBINSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 1976.
Decided April 28, 1977.
William T. Shulick, Blairsville, for appellant.
Walter S. Vuckovich, Dist. Atty., Indiana, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
